Translations.Text: Vi not those ricev portion scripture kaj kiel ili kred en idolatry false doctrine tiam dir disbelievers est put direkt than believers
est ili incurred di condemnation whomever DI kondamn vi ne trov any helper him
Ili own akci sovereignty? Ili did ili ne don popol gren
Est ili envious de popol because DI dusx them His blessings? Ni don Abraham's famili scripture wisdom; ni granted them great auxtoritat
Kelk da them kred therein kelk da them repelled therefrom Infer est nur just retribution por these
Surely those disbelieve our revelations ni kondamn them hellfire. Whenever their hauxt brul ni don them neo hauxt. Tiel ili sufer continuously. DI est Almighty SAGX
As por those kred plumb righteous life ni admit them gxarden flu streams ili abide therein forever Ili hav pur spouses therein. Ni admit them blissful shade
DI KOMAND VI don anything POPOL KONFID VI. Vi jugx among des popol, vi jugx equitably. Bon enlightenment ja est ki DI rekomend vi. DI est Hearer Seer
O vi kred vi obe DI vi obe messenger those en charge vi! Vi disput any materi vi refer gxi DI messenger vi kred en DI Last Tag. This est bon vi proviz vi put solution
